description: Agrayu is an innovative platform, aimed at enhancing the profitability of family farmers in Peru. By providing traceable agricultural inputs and tailored technical advice, Agrayu empowers farmers through specialized farm programs. The initiative aims to democratize agricultural competitiveness, ensuring that small-scale farmers have access to the same resources as larger agribusinesses. With a focus on sustainability and community impact, Agros is transforming the agricultural landscape for countless families.
name: Agrayu
